name: Wireframe Kit (with Variants)
description:
About the kit

This is the first version of my wireframe kit I've been using personally for awhile. It is meant to speed up the low-fidelity design process so you might spend more time designing and testing it, rather than making it.


It is based on the Device Templates from Maxim, although slightly altered based on how I used them. All the icons from the Feather Icons plugin by Cole.


I sincerely hope it helps you! If you have any recommendations, feature-requests, or bugs, let me know on Twitter or below! ðŸ‘‡ Happy to fix it or add new things! ðŸ˜Š

  • Onboarding/tutorial missing â†’ Hard to get started
  • Add all icons from Feather Icons
  • Split components up more â†’ There is a lot of capability, but it's not easy drag and drop
  • Interactive components incoming! ðŸŽ‰
